bibl.title: Notes on P.Mich. inv. 3498 + 3250b recto, 3250a and 3250c recto (list of lyric and tragic incipits)
bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 3498 + 3250a + 3250b + 3250 c recto (= M.-P.3 1596.1; LDAB 7079). - 1. A poet between two loves. - 2. Philosophical advice: How to leave your lover. - 3. A parallel to Alcaeus fr. 42 V. - 4. Anacreon on old age. - 5. Anacreon mad once again? - 6. The presence of Anacreon in the whole collection. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Hans Bernsdorff, Notes on P.Mich. inv. 3498 + 3250b Recto, 3250a and 3250c Recto (List of Lyric and Tragic Incipits).

P. Mich. Inv. 3498 + 3250a + 3250b + 3250 c recto (= M.-P.3 1596.1; LDAB 7079). - 1. A poet between two loves. - 2. Philosophical advice: How to leave your lover. - 3.
